args.color: Embed border color; Must be a valid color string or color hex
args.title: Embed title
args.timestamp: Whether or not to add a timestamp

response.confirm: Please confirm that the embed looks correct
response.invalidDesc: The description you provided was invalid
response.limitName: Exceeded `256` character limit for author name
response.limitFoot: Exceeded `2048` character limit for footer text
response.limitEmbed: Your embed exceeds the `6000` character limit :confused:

help.name: help
help.desc: Lists all available commands and description

response.embedDesc: __greet__ `__u__`, below are commands you may use to tell me what to do. All commands are accessible using `/`.

**Server Name:** __guild_name__
**Server ID:** `__guild_id__`
**Server DOB:** __guild_createdAt__
**Server Region:** __guild_region__

**Channel Count:** __guild_channels__
**Role Count:** __guild_roles__
**Member Count:** __guild_memberCount__
**Bans Count:** __bans__
**Invites Count:** __invites__

**Server Owner:** __guild_owner__
**Owner ID:** `__guild_ownerID__`

**Channel Name:** __channel_name__
**Channel ID:** `__channel_id__`
**Channel Type:** __channel_type__

args.days: Days of inactivity to prune by (between 1 - 30)

response.fail:
Unable to prune; I ran into this issue: 

`__err__`
response.invalid:
I'm unable to prune by `__d__` days 

Try a number between 1 - 30
response.confirm: Are you sure you wish to prune `__n__` members?

purge.name: purge
purge.desc: Deletes 'n' number of messages, up to 100 at a time (<14 days old)

args.target: Only purge posts by specified user

response.invalid:
I can't purge `__n__` posts :thinking: 

Try entering a number between 1 - 100
response.noscope:
Some of the posts you want me to delete are older than 14 days :confused: 

Try entering a smaller number

args.n: Number of die to roll, defaults to 1 (max 100)
args.bonuses: A bonus modifier to add on to the final roll result

response.invalidN: I cannot roll `__n__` dice :confused: Please pick a number between 1 - 100
response.invalidBonus: Bonus modifier of `__bonus__` exceeds my limit :confused: Please use a number between -1,000,000 and 1,000,000
response.embedDesc:
__phrase__! `__u__` has initiated a roll of `__n__x` **d__type__**.

**Your Rolls**
__results__

**Base Sum:** __sum__
**+ Modifier:** __bonus__

**Grand Total:** __total__

errors.unknown: I haven't learned that command yet. My dev is still working hard on adding new ones though. :neutral_face:
errors.noPermsBot:
I don't have the `__p__` permission to do that :confused: 
Tell an admin to do the thing
errors.noPermsUser: You aren't allowed to use that command as you are missing the `__p__` permission :shrug:
errors.noAccess: That command can't be used in DMs :thinking:
errors.fail: Failed to run command; My diagnostics indicate the following issue:
